page.title: 20Poem of Penshurst
page.content: Penshurst is a village where all the children play. They have a grand adventure playground to amuse themselves each day. Penshurst is full of History. It's like the olden days. It still has an old Blacksmithy Though it's past its blacksmiths ways. Penshurst has a landmark So tourists aren't all that rare. It's Penshurst Place with all its splendour And its country game fair. Penshurst has lush green grass And healthy swaying trees. The beautiful coloured flowers. The humming of the bees. I do love living near Penshurst. It's such a brilliant place. And if I turn to kids terms. I guess its really{ACE!!!
